1644660.name: Imperfect
1644660.description:
-Reveal hidden secrets and lurking enemies with a collection of mystical frames given to you by a mysterious observer.

-Fight what hides in the shadows using your frames and ancient supernatural machines discovered in the world. Don’t let what hides in the deadly darkness steal away your light.

-Explore a cryptic and surreal world filled with dangerous inhabitants and challenging puzzles.

-Experience vivid visions that transport you to the moments in your past that led you to this place.

Imperfect's art process is totally unique, bringing the illustrations of 19th Century Artist, Gustave Doré into a new dimension. Check out the videos above for a look behind the scenes.

Imperfect will be a short, high quality experience. The playtime will be 2-3 hours, but perhaps longer if you uncover every secret.

Join our Discord! You'll be able to be a part of testing the game!
1644660.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
